abstract: After nearly a year of having their cash frozen in two big hedge funds, investors in Kenneth C. Griffin’s Citadel Investment Group will now be able to withdrawal their cash.
snippet: After nearly a year of having their cash frozen in two big hedge funds, investors in Kenneth C. Griffin’s Citadel Investment Group will now be able to withdrawal their cash.
lead_paragraph: After nearly a year of having their cash frozen in two big hedge funds, investors in Kenneth C. Griffin’s Citadel Investment Group will now be able to withdraw their cash.

headline.main: Citadel to Allow Withdrawals Beginning Nov. 30
